text: Thunderbolt and Lightfoot is a 1974 American crime comedy-drama movie. Clint Eastwood and Jeff Bridges play the title characters. This was the first movie directed by Michael Cimino. Jeff Bridges was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actor. This was his second nomination. This movie was released on September 2, 1974. Its reviews were good. == References == ==Other websites== * * Category:1974 comedy-drama movies Category:1970s criminal comedy movies Category:1974 crime drama movies Category:1970s road movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:American criminal comedy movies Category:American crime drama movies Category:Movies set in Montana
title: Thunderbolt and Lightfoot
